thread.title: Kylie Jenner blasted by fans after she lights up in latest Instagram snaps
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner blasted by fans after she lights up in latest Instagram snaps

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Kylie Jenner blasted by fans after she lights up in latest Instagram snaps
text:
Kylie Jenner blasted by fans after she lights up in latest Instagram snaps The 19-year-old is puffing on what appears to be a cigarette in the black and white shots Share Under fire: Kylie Jenner (Photo: Instagram) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Keeping Up With The Kardashians star Kylie Jenner has shocked some of her fans with her latest social media snaps. 
The young businesswoman's latest Instagram photos see her posing seductively on a bed while puffing on a what appears to be a cigarette. 
And she soon came under fire from followers who thought she should be setting a better example. 
"She's smoking. Unfollow - I thought you were cool," one of her fans fumed underneath the picture. 
"Stop smoking nasty," another bluntly commented. 
A third asked: "Kylie is really smoking or it's just for the photo?" https://www.instagram.com/p/BRGo1stBwy_/?taken-by=kyliejenner&hl=en/embed 
It's the second time in less than a week that the 19-year-old has been slammed by her fans who are beginning to realise just how much she's transformed since she first appeared on Keeping Up With The Kardashians. 
The star, who recently sparked speculation she's engaged to rapper boyfriend Tyga , become the target of a hilarious new meme that suggests she's only looks as good as she does because of her family's cash. Kylie Jenner (Photo: Instagram) Kylie Jenner visits the pool at the Mirage on June 26, 2012 (Photo: Barcroft Media) 
Alongside a picture of her then and now, the meme reads: "This type of puberty is called money." 
The image has been shared thousands of times on social media after Kylie shared a snap of herself posing in a skimpy black bikini. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
